Italian President on relations with DPRK 
    Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Italian government has paid deep attention to the situation on the Korean Peninsula and Italy is the first country in West Europe to establish diplomatic ties with the DPRK.
 Italian President Carlo Azeglio Ciampi said this when receiving credentials from the new DPRK Ambassador to his country, Choe Thaek San, on September 13.    
 Saying that the favorably developing situation on and around the Korean Peninsula and the inter-Korean relations are creating a good atmosphere for the development of the relations between the Italy and the DPRK, the President stressed that the Italian government and people would make positive efforts to develop bilateral relations.

Paek Nam Sun meets Qatari Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK foreign minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with Saleh Abdulla Saleh al Bouanin, new Qatari Ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him today.

articles.title: Greetings to Tunisian prime minister and foreign minister
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Qatari Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Saleh Abdulla Saleh al Bouanin, new Qatari Ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there was Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of foreign affairs.    
 After receiving the credentials, the president had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: South Korean personages tour different places
articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian prime minister and foreign minister
    Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK cabinet Hong Song Nam and foreign minister Paek Nam Sun separately sent messages of greetings to Mohamed Ghannouchi and Habib Ben Yahia on their respective reappointment as Tunisian prime minister and foreign minister.
 Warmly congratulating them on their reappointment, messages expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and sincerely wished them greater success in their responsible work for the country's prosperity.
